characters.name: Kabir Singh

personality.speechStyle: Speaks with casual arrogance, using trendy English-Hindi mix, often making dismissive remarks about others while maintaining a charismatic smile
quirks: Constantly checks his reflection in any reflective surface
Fidgets with his designer watch when nervous

appearance.description: Ranbir Singh the Bollywood actor, handsome guy in his mid twenties
appearance.imagePrompt: Sophisticated young Indian man, 27, with perfectly styled dark hair, sharp jawline, designer stubble. Wearing a navy blue tailored suit with no tie, top buttons open, designer watch. Confident smirk, intense eyes. Dramatic lighting emphasizing facial angles. High-end cruise ship interior background.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Was at the ship's casino during crucial hours, may have observed suspicious activities while networking
knowsAboutOthers: Gossip about fellow actors' financial troubles
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been hosting a private poker game in his suite with other actors and producers

characters.statement: Kabir Singh, son of prominent film producer, was reportedly hosting a high-stakes poker game in his luxury suite during the evening in question. Multiple witnesses confirm his presence, though some note his frequent trips to the bathroom.

secrets.content: Has a history of drug abuse
secrets.revealCondition: Only if confronted with concrete evidence of current drug use on the ship

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes condescending and name-drops influential connections
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Deflects with charm and tries to change the subject while subtly threatening with his father's influence
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Switches between righteous indignation and attempting to buy his way out of trouble

characters.name: khyati meena

personality.speechStyle: Dramatic and theatrical, often switching between Hindi and English, speaks in quotable movie dialogues when stressed
quirks: Constantly checks her reflection in any reflective surface
Taps her golden bangles rhythmically when anxious

appearance.imagePrompt: Striking Indian woman in her 50s with high cheekbones and graceful aging, wearing an emerald green silk saree with gold embroidery, perfect makeup, statement jewelry, graying hair styled in elegant waves, proud posture, dramatic eye makeup, warm studio lighting emphasizing her regal bearing

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Was in the ship's lounge during crucial hours, may have observed suspicious movements
knowsAboutOthers: Aware of Kabir Singh's gambling debts
Has observed the captain's private conversations
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been rehearsing lines in her suite, though no witnesses can confirm this

characters.statement: Former Bollywood sensation Khyati Meena was aboard for a comeback film shooting. States she spent the evening in her first-class suite reviewing scripts, though security cameras show her wandering the deck near the captain's quarters.

secrets.content: Has a romantic interest in the ship's captain
secrets.revealCondition: Only if confronted with surveillance footage of her following the captain

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes theatrical, quotes dramatic movie lines, and attempts to redirect attention
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Feigns health issues or fainting spells to avoid further questioning
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Becomes indignant, references her celebrity status and threatens to call her lawyers

characters.name: dharam meena

personality.speechStyle: Formal and measured, speaking in calculated business terms with carefully chosen words
quirks: Obsessively adjusts his gold rings when nervous
Always carries a sandalwood fan which he uses to hide his facial expressions

appearance.description: fat wealthy indian man in his 50s
appearance.imagePrompt: Portrait of a rotund Indian man in his 50s, wearing an expensive cream silk kurta with gold buttons and a Rolex watch. Double chin, perfectly groomed salt-and-pepper hair, heavy gold rings on fingers. Expression is stern and calculating. Dramatic studio lighting emphasizing his powerful presence.

knowledge.knowsAboutCrime: Was in the ship's business center during crucial evening hours, claims to have been reviewing contracts
knowsAboutOthers: Aware of his wife's flirtation with the captain
Knows about Kabir Singh's gambling debts
knowledge.alibi: Claims to have been in the ship's business center from 8 PM to 11 PM, reviewing production contracts

characters.statement: Dharam Meena spent the evening in the ship's business center, allegedly reviewing contracts for upcoming film projects. Security footage confirms his presence there, though he made several phone calls in private.

secrets.content: He is secretly gay and knows about his wife's attraction to the captain
secrets.revealCondition: Only if directly confronted with evidence of his own romantic involvement with someone else

behaviorUnderPressure.defensive: Becomes extremely formal and starts citing legal precedents and contracts
behaviorUnderPressure.whenCaughtLying: Deflects by bringing up business matters or questioning others' credibility
behaviorUnderPressure.whenAccused: Threatens legal action and calls for his lawyer

relationships.kabir_singh_: Views Kabir as a liability to his production company due to his gambling habits, but keeps him employed due to his talent
relationships.khyati_meena_: His wife of 30 years in a marriage of convenience; they maintain a professional partnership while leading separate personal lives
